item.description: Gödel, Escher, Bach: an Eternal Golden Braid (1979) The Mind’s I: Fantasies and Reflections on Self and Soul (1981) Metamagical Themas: Questing for the Essence of Mind and Pattern (1985) Fluid Concepts and Creative Analogies (1991) Le Ton beau de Marot: In Praise of the Music of Language (1997) I Am a Strange Loop (2008) Surfaces and Essences: Analogy as the Fuel and Fire of Thinking (2011)
